prompts: Create a small, ground-type Pokemon that has a spiky back and a curious expression.
Make a cute yellow Pokemon with a round body and a playful nature.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by a desert creature, featuring a sandy color palette.
Show me a tiny Pokemon that loves to dig and has a soft, furry belly.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a shrew, with bright eyes and a mischievous grin.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sturdy shell, perfect for defense and burrowing underground.
Give me a playful ground-type Pokemon that thrives in sandy environments.
